column4: He isn't on his own server, he's using a hosting plan. Therefore he cannot access apache config
oh then why is  harsh343 here?  he never provided that info or I misted it

Yeah, he thinks he can use apache but he cant, that's why you missed it. He wants a subdomain for his domain, but that has to be done with the host. I don't even know what hosting plan he used cause he hasn't told me (I've asked)
